error.message: The page you were looking for may have moved or you may have been redirected here by mistake.

help.data: From the wonderful people of the Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group (EDRDG) at Monash University.
help.dataTitle: 2. Where does this information come from?
help.requests: Please do not send me requests. I am NOT qualified.
help.requestsTitle: 3. Can you help me with something?
help.site: This site is intended to be a useful asset for Japanese learning. With simple, interactive UI tools, identifying kanji should be an easier and less time consuming affair. Allowing for more time spent learning and less time searching.
help.suggestions: At this time I'm not accepting feature requests as I already have a lot planned. When I manage to work through it enough I will change this section to include a means of contact. Sorry!
help.suggestionsTitle: 4. I have a suggestion for the website!

kanjiInfo.error400: Error 400: Bad Request to backend (try refreshing the page?)
kanjiInfo.error404: Error 404: Entry not found (some kanji may be incomplete, please check the external links instead)

multi.instructions: Click a radical to get started, kanji composed of selected radicals will appear on the right

settings.themeDesc: Changes the display theme (requires refresh for now)
